did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, memorabilia, photographs, printed materials, publications
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files relating to student and alumni activities and campus governance including the Committee to Review the Dean of Students Office, Quill and Dagger, the Public Safety Advisory Board, the Campus Store Administrative Board, and the Budget Policies Committee, the Career Center of the Johnson Graduate School of Management, and fundraising efforts for the Johnson School and for the Campus Life Campaign Committee (with memorabilia from the campaign). Also, "Helping Cornell Begin its Journey Towards Legendary Service: Highways, Bumpy Roads and Potholes," by Kenneth Blanchard and Gligor Tashkovich. Program for 1984 memorial service for Erin Nieswand and Young Hee Suh, students murdered in 1983, 1984, with photographs of memorial trees and plaque dedicated to their memory. Folder with material concerning the Membership Solicitation Program. Clippings relating to the Cornell Board of Trustees and the Student Assembly.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University Class of 1987, M.B.A. '91. In 2006, he was named Minister for Foreign Investment in the new Government in the Republic of Macedonia.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files relating to student and alumni activities and campus governance.
Also, holiday cards and other correspondence relating to Cornell activities, and letters from Cornell units about 9/11.

Files of brochures, programs, invitations, etc. relating to Seal & Serpent, the College of Arts & Sciences, the Johnson School of Management, the Law School, and the College of Veterinary Medicine; to the Cornell Association of Class Officers, the Asian Alumni Association, the Chimes, the Big Red Band, the Johnson Art Museum, the Library, and the Plantations. Also, program from the NAACP National Equal Justice Award Dinner honoring Jeffrey Lehman.

Also, materials relating to Macedonia, Albania, Azerbaijan, Bulgaria, Rumania, and other Balkan countries. Including files about the Center for Civil and Human Rights (CCHR), the only organization dedicated to serving the needs of and advocating for the LGBT community in Macedonia. Files relating to the Council on Foreign Relations. Copies of "Russian Petroleum Investor," 1994-1999; and other materials on oil pipelines. Materials relating to the elections in Kazakhstan for which Tashkovich was an election observer, 2004. T-shirts from the Olympics in Sidney, Australia, 2000; Athens, 2004; and Beijing, 2008; hat from Salt Lake City Olympics, 2002.
Also, items collected after becoming Minister for Foreign Investment, Republic of Macedonia.
Holiday cards and invitations from Macedonia, 2006.
File of about 90 (Nigerian) advance-fee scam Internet letters, collected by Tashkovich.

T-shirt for Bidzina Ivanishvili from the October 1, 2012 Parliamentary elections in Georgia, the election in which billionaire Ivanishvili's opposition Georgian Dream coalition won a majority of seats

did.unittitle: ODIHR - Election Observation Mission: Bosnia and Herzegovina - Folder 1

scopecontent.p: General Elections on October 3, 2010. ODIHR = Office for Democratic Insitutions and Human Rights. Contains a letter to Tashkovich explaining acceptance of position as a Short-Term Election Observer, along with an Interim Report from OSCE explaining the structure, concerns, and climate of the general elections. Included also is a compilation of legal documents for short-term observers, a contract for national staff, observation report forms, and other related materials.

did.unittitle: ODIHR - Election Observation Mission: Bosnia and Herzegovina - Folder 2

scopecontent.p: Contains manuals for polling commissions in Bosnia and Herzegovina, a logistics information booklet, a blank qualitative election observation form, rules of conduct, and a regional briefing pack.

did.unittitle: ODIHR - Election Observation Mission: Bosnia and Herzegovina - Folder 3

scopecontent.p: Contains a glossary of election terminology, an election observation handbook, and an international observer guide.
